overview: Peter Karsten creates, starts and runs new projects and companies in the (mobile) telecom sector. Examples include the mobile analytics company Acquad and mobile gaming company Cecure Gaming, for which Peter Karsten raised all funding and closed all agreements. Fundraising has included US venture funding from companies such as Bessemer Venture Partners, European wealthy individuals, investors from Hong Kong and online gaming companies. Peter Karsten was head of Wireless Services at Nokia before he became Senior Vice President at Sonera, the Finnish telecom company, Vice President mobile banking worldwide at Citibank, and is now also VP Sales for Cordys - the Dutch business operations process middleware company. Peter Karsten’s skills at tennis, off-shore fishing and soccer are often mocked in the five languages Peter speaks - especially by his two children.
